item.title: 2 abandoned pedal bikes in cargo bike hire bay, 13th November
item.description:
Two abandoned pedal bikes have been blocking the on-street racks for some time - one is a Buzzbike without a saddle; the other has a broken chain. This bay is now being used for cargo bike hire (public hire scheme).

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Calvert Avenue, Hackney, London
